name: Armored Rebuff
summary: You rebuff puny attacks with your armor, knocking back your foe.
description:
You rebuff puny attacks with your armor, knocking back your foe. Attempt an Athletics check to Shove the triggering foe, even if you don't have a hand free. If you succeed, you can't Stride to follow the foe, as you're knocking the foe back with the rebounded attack, not by physically moving towards them.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
trigger: An adjacent foe critically fails an attack roll to Strike you with a melee weapon or unarmed attack.
